page.title: 051,st Hayle Scout Troup
page.content: The 1,st Hayle Scout Troup was founded in 1912,it has four patrols,three leaders and twenty-eight members.The names of the patrols are Kestral,Eagle Falcon and Woodpecker.Each patrol has a leader and seven or more scouts. We have two camps every summer, one District (a week-end camp)and one Troup camp that lasts for a week.We meet on Monday nights from 2O:OO -21:3O hours.We first have Flag Break. Flag Break is when the Union Jack has been tied up in a length of rope and a scout is picked to pull the end of the rope and make the flag unravel. Then we go to the park or somewhere else to play games if it's dry,if not we play indoor games.To become a Scout you have to attend two meetings and one activity.The uniform is like the army only it has a scarf and woggle.
